works.description:
This is a PTT application for Android  
devices for RoIP functions prviding users with the ability to interoperate
 
with two-way radio systems equipped with Critical RF, Inc. hardware and  
software. This is utilized by both public safety and commercial users. The
 
app allows the users to monitor and participate in traffic on their
systems  
regardless of where they are as long as they have a data connection with  
their device.
